txt.en: 'I did not believe my own eyes when I saw a nameless creature of flame enter Fushaum Tûm. It must be another one of these emissaries from Nargroth that I have heard about. We can not let Fushaum Tûm and Nargroth join forces. It would spell doom for the Gondorian presence here.'
A notice is pinned to the board, signed by Ingold:\n\n'An emissary from Nargroth has been spotted in Fushaum Tûm. A brave adventurer is needed to defeat the Rogmul emissary and those of Fushaum Tûm.'
Defeated the Rogmul Emissary and additional foes in Fushaum Tum.
Ingold has asked you to defeat the Rogmul Emissary visiting Fushaum Tûm and to defeat those who may be persuaded by the Nameless creature.
You have aided the efforts within Mordor during your continues watch over Dor Amarth so that these lands do not fall back into evil hands.
Ingold, a soldier of Gondor, has scouted Dor Amarth and is concerned with the growing numbers of foes gathering at the encampment of Fushaum Tûm.
